Available courses are : BBA, BCA, BSW, ENglish
Rabindranatha Tagore

Gurudev Arts and Science College was established in the year 2002 at Mathil, and is affiliated to Kannur University. It is one of the most reputed Catholic colleges managed by Corporate Educational Agency of the Catholic Diocese of Sulthan Bathery, Wayanad. His Excellency Most. Rev. Dr. Joseph Mar Thomas is the Manager and Patron of this college.

Yes, after completing BBA, students can make a successful career in BBA jobs such as Marketing Executive, Business Development Executive, Brand Manager, Event Manager, Account Manager, Financial Analyst, and more. There is a steady rise in jobs for BBA graduates as per the latest trends

After completing your BCA, you are eligible for various entry-level jobs in the IT sector. You can also go for higher studies and pursue an MCA, which will open even more doors to success for you. The BCA degree is an efficient enabler that sets you up for a bright career in terms of jobs.

A bachelor's degree in social work (BSW) is ideal for entry-level positions in disciplines such as family services, child welfare, public health, and substance abuse. Clinical social workers, on the other hand, usually continue their education to get a Master of Social Work degree (MSW)

Other common careers with an English degree include librarianship, archiving, bookselling, information and research, tourism, events management, social work, youth work, probation work, human resources, retail management and sales.

patterns: does the college provide hostel facility
responses: The college provides hostel for both girls and boys,   The hostel is situated near the college ground ,only a 2 min walk from the college ground
